1219/jdk 1.3.1_01/w2k

1. Create a Main class, with a main method.
(I then cloned N copies of the main method - may be relavent)
2. Select the type and select override methods on the popup.
3. Add Object.hashCode().

Two internal errors occur, and then eclipse exits.
